name: The Machine (Piepsii, Marpal, SH Creative Corner, matildal, Omnievul, Thraez)
name_original: The Machine (Piepsii, Marpal, SH Creative Corner, matildal, Omnievul, Thraez)
description:
The Machine

The Machine is a university project made by a team of six 1st year game design students. The aesthetic goal we were assigned is 'A patched-together machine - Playing should feel like operating wonky and broken machinery'.
